name: White Sauce
description: A quick white sauce, with real food ingredients—no need for added oils or preservatives here.

ingredients.name: Savory Herb Gravy Mix or Nourish Broth Mix
Minced Garlic or Rosemary Garlic Seasoning

preparation: In a microwave-safe bowl, whisk gravy mix and milk.
Cook 2 minutes on high, stir, then cook 2 more minutes.
Stir in Minced Garlic and season, if desired.
In a saucepan, whisk gravy and milk.
Bring to a boil, whisking constantly, until thickened.
Stir in Minced Garlic and season, if desired.
tips: Make it vegan: Use almond, soy, or rice milk.
